title: Georgina Howard
deck: I’m Georgina. I am married to Mark I have 3 grown up children – one daughter, two sons and two daughters-in-law, and one adorable grandson. I co-lead a LifeGroup, and I’ve been a member of Gateway Church for 28 years. In my spare time I enjoy eating cake and drinking coffee, and getting to know to people. For exercise I swim and run. I also enjoy cooking within Gateway, and have worked in Gateway café until recently.
